synopsis.text: Soul Successor to Jongtama PONGâ˜†, this animated series brings back the eccentric Jyanshis in a fresh wave of adventures. Brace yourself for their hilarious foray into the world of live streaming, join two companions on their journey together, and witness their unforeseen skirmishes with local gangs. The unique allure of the Jyanshis shines brighter than ever in these unpredictable escapades. (Source: Mahjong Soul News, reimagined)
